text: [You feel something wet and slimy under your foot. You take a step back and try to stamp it off.]

name: Ashton
text: M-Maybe that’s just the lighting. I hope it’s not some kind of mold.
[You look further into the water and notice that this wasn’t just a stray patch.]
[The black goo stretches into the pool in a straight line, connecting to other lines that go out to other spots on the edge.]
[In the middle of all of them, there was some kind of black mass.]
[You take out your phone to take a picture, but once you focus your camera, you notice something.]
[You stand frozen in place for a moment, unable to form a thought on what to do.]
[The blob crests the water and you begin to see its face.]
[Well, it could probably be considered a face.]
